intents.name: greeting
intents.description: User greets the bot or starts conversation
responses: Hello! üëã Welcome to TechMart Solutions! I'm here to help you with products, orders, and any questions you have. What can I assist you with today?
Hi there! üòä Great to see you! I can help you browse our catalog, track orders, answer questions, or connect you with our team. How can I help?
Hey! Welcome to TechMart! I'm your virtual assistant, ready to help with anything you need. What brings you here today?

intents.name: product_inquiry
intents.description: User asks about products or wants to browse catalog
responses: I'd be happy to help you find the perfect product! üõçÔ∏è Here are our main categories:
Great! Let me show you what we have available. What type of product are you looking for?
Perfect! We have an amazing selection. Let me help you find exactly what you need!

intents.name: order_tracking
intents.description: User wants to track or check order status
responses: I'll help you track your order! üì¶ Could you please provide your order number?
Let me look up your order status. What's your order number?
I can definitely check that for you! Please share your order number and I'll get the latest update.

intents.name: appointment_booking

responses: I'd be happy to schedule an appointment for you! üìÖ What type of service do you need?
Great! Let me help you book the right service. What would you like to schedule?

intents.name: price_inquiry

responses: I can help you with pricing information! üí∞ What specific product or service are you interested in?
Let me get you the latest pricing details. What would you like to know the cost of?
Sure! I have all our current prices. What are you looking to purchase?

intents.name: complaint
intents.description: User has a complaint or problem
responses: I'm really sorry to hear you're having trouble! üòü I want to help resolve this immediately. Can you tell me more about the issue?
I apologize for any inconvenience! Let me help fix this right away. What specific problem are you experiencing?
I understand your frustration and I'm here to help! Please share the details so I can assist you properly.

intents.name: return_request
intents.description: User wants to return or exchange an item
responses: No problem! I can help you with the return process. üîÑ Do you have your order number handy?
I'll help you start a return right away. What's your order number and what would you like to return?
Sure thing! Returns are easy with us. Let me walk you through the process.

intents.name: payment_inquiry

responses: We accept many payment methods! üí≥ Let me show you all your options.
Great question! We have flexible payment options including financing. What works best for you?

intents.name: business_hours

responses: Here are our current business hours! üïê
I can share our hours with you! Which department are you interested in?
Let me give you our operating hours!

intents.name: location_inquiry

responses: We'd love to see you in person! üìç Here's our location information:

intents.name: technical_support

examples: how do I set this up
responses: I'm here to help with technical support! üîß What product are you having trouble with?
Let me assist you with that technical issue. Can you describe what's happening?
Technical support is one of our specialties! What do you need help setting up or fixing?

intents.name: human_agent

responses: Of course! I'll connect you with one of our team members. üë• Let me transfer you to the right department.
I'd be happy to connect you with a human agent! What department would be most helpful?
No problem! Let me get you connected with the right person to help you.
